location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to Lieutenant Colonel Macdonald, Envoy to the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: Acknowledges receipt of Macdonald's letter dated 26 July 1826 transmitting Bills for Stannus for the use of the Mission and another letter dated 27 July 1826 transmitting a register of Drafts on the Bushire treasury. Stannus informs Macdonald that during the Mohurrum [Muá¸¥arram] ceremonies no business is transacted by the merchants.
